item.title: Intro
item.description:
Welcome to the Castor Security blog, where we delve into the fascinating world of cybersecurity and share insights from our engagements uncovering vulnerabilities in software and systems.

In the coming weeks, we will be sharing detailed write-ups about the intriguing bugs we have encountered during our engagements. From critical vulnerabilities in popular software applications to unique security flaws in emerging technologies, our blog will provide a behind-the-scenes look at the exciting discoveries made by our researchers. In the meanwhile

Stay secure.

Castor Security
